#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
unsigned long long t,n;

int ip=getchar_unlocked(),ret=0,flag=1;
for(;ip<'0'||ip>'9';ip=getchar_unlocked())
if(ip=='-')
{flag=-1;ip=getchar_unlocked();break;}
for(;ip>='0'&&ip<='9';ip=getchar_unlocked())
ret=ret*10+ip-'0';
t=flag*ret;
for(;t--;)
{
 ip=getchar_unlocked(),ret=0,flag=1;
for(;ip<'0'||ip>'9';ip=getchar_unlocked())
if(ip=='-')
{flag=-1;ip=getchar_unlocked();break;}
for(;ip>='0'&&ip<='9';ip=getchar_unlocked())
ret=ret*10+ip-'0';
n=flag*ret;

if(!(n&(n-1)))
{putchar('N');putchar('o');putchar('\n');}
else
{putchar('Y');putchar('e');putchar('s');putchar('\n');}
}

return 0;
}
